name: Egypt Escape:Escape The Room Of Pyramid
name_original: Egypt Escape:Escape The Room Of Pyramid
description:
You are an experienced adventurer, you travels to Egypt to assist national archaeological team in the pyramid archaeological action. your team rest of a night outside the pyramid, when you wake up you can't find other members, what happened?

You have to find your team as soon as possible, are you ready to accept the challenge?
